pl.myrecipebasket.service

Class RecipeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.myrecipebasket.service.RecipeService

  • @Service
public class RecipeService
extends java.lang.Object
    Object RecipeService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (RecipeRepository & UserRepository & CategoryRepository) and view layer (CommentController & HomeController & RecipeController & VoteController). Contains all Recipe related business logic of MyRecipeBasket application.
    See Also:
    RecipeRepository, UserRepository, CategoryRepository, CommentController, HomeController, RecipeController, VoteController

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RecipeService.VoteComparator
      Object VoyeComparator holds a comparison function that imposes order in which two Recipe object should be sorted.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Recipe> getAllSharedRecipes()
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all shared Recipes.
      java.util.List<Recipe> getAllSharedRecipesWithinCategory(java.lang.String cName)
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all shared Recipes that belong to Category which name equals to one provided as parameter of this method.
      java.util.List<Recipe> getAllUsersRecipesWhithinCategory(java.lang.String cName, User user)
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all Recipes that belong to Category which name equals to one provided as parameter to this method, and were added by particular User who also was a parameter of this method.
      Recipe getRecipeById(java.lang.Long id)
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database single Recipe object which id property equals to one provided as parameter of this method.
      java.util.List<Recipe> getRecipesAddedByUser(User user)
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all Recipes added by User provided as parameter of this method.
      void removeRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      This method removes Recipe from MyRecipeBasket database.
      void saveRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      This method persists Recipe object in MyRecipeBasket database
      void setCategoryRepository(CategoryRepository categoryRepository)
      This method injects CategortRepository object into RecipeService and enables RecipeService to perform CRUD operations on Category database table.
      void setRecipeRepository(RecipeRepository recipeRepository)
      This method injects RecipeRepository object into RecipeService and enables RecipeService to perform CRUD operations on Recipe database table.
      void setUserRepository(UserRepository userRepository)
      This method injects UserRepository object into RecipeService and enables RecipeService to perform CRUD operations on User database table.

    • Method Detail

      • setRecipeRepository

        @Autowired
public void setRecipeRepository(RecipeRepository recipeRepository)
        This method injects RecipeRepository object into RecipeService and enables RecipeService to perform CRUD operations on Recipe database table.
        Parameters:
        recipeRepository - RecipeRepository object

      • setUserRepository

        @Autowired
public void setUserRepository(UserRepository userRepository)
        This method injects UserRepository object into RecipeService and enables RecipeService to perform CRUD operations on User database table.
        Parameters:
        userRepository - UserRepository object

      • setCategoryRepository

        @Autowired
public void setCategoryRepository(CategoryRepository categoryRepository)
        This method injects CategortRepository object into RecipeService and enables RecipeService to perform CRUD operations on Category database table.
        Parameters:

      • saveRecipe

        public void saveRecipe(Recipe recipe)
        This method persists Recipe object in MyRecipeBasket database
        Parameters:
        recipe - Recipe object

      • getRecipesAddedByUser

        public java.util.List<Recipe> getRecipesAddedByUser(User user)
        This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all Recipes added by User provided as parameter of this method.
        Parameters:
        user - User whose Recipes are being looked for
        Returns:
        a list of Recipe objects

      • getRecipeById

        public Recipe getRecipeById(java.lang.Long id)
        This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database single Recipe object which id property equals to one provided as parameter of this method.
        Parameters:
        id - id property of Recipe object that is being looked for
        Returns:
        Recipe object

      • getAllSharedRecipes

        public java.util.List<Recipe> getAllSharedRecipes()
        This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all shared Recipes.
        Returns:
        a list of Recipe objects

      • getAllSharedRecipesWithinCategory

        public java.util.List<Recipe> getAllSharedRecipesWithinCategory(java.lang.String cName)
        This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all shared Recipes that belong to Category which name equals to one provided as parameter of this method.
        Parameters:
        cName - name of Category within which shared Recipes are being looked for
        Returns:
        a list of Recipe objects

      • getAllUsersRecipesWhithinCategory

        public java.util.List<Recipe> getAllUsersRecipesWhithinCategory(java.lang.String cName,
                                                                User user)
        This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all Recipes that belong to Category which name equals to one provided as parameter to this method, and were added by particular User who also was a parameter of this method.
        Parameters:
        cName - name of Category within which Recipes are being looked for
        user - User whose Recipes are being looked for
        Returns:
        a list of Recipe objects

      • removeRecipe

        public void removeRecipe(Recipe recipe)
        This method removes Recipe from MyRecipeBasket database.
        Parameters:
        recipe - Recipe object that is to be removed
